item.description:
alot of people have asked about this and I hope to make it one day, with all of you. this sunday I've planned open houses for real estate, in the hopes of making some money :) most of you can't wait until friday, with me...mondays are best...lol.
check out the bands website, www.surfside5.com
surfside band? is a great reggae band and they play from 4-8. get there early to avoid long lines. just an idea, if you have nothing to do the Salem Divorce and Parenting group will be there. just look for a bunch of young'ns. jen is the organizer.
anyway, have a great weekend!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: reggae at surfside in salisbury, ma
